alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Southern High Plains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 12:59AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Pondera, southern Liberty, southeastern Toole, eastern Teton, southwestern Hill, western Chouteau and northern Cascade Counties through 145 AM MDT... At 100 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles east of The Knees to near Fairfield. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Great Falls, Choteau, Fort Benton, Cascade, Fairfield, Dutton, Fort Shaw, Brady, The Knees, Highwood, Black Eagle, Fort Shaw, Power, Carter, Floweree, Tiber Dam, Ulm and Simms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Southern High Plains; Western and Central Chouteau County
